title: Bug or Normal ?
body:
I think i have found a bug with Azir's ultimate on One for All, i don't know if it's a bug or not. Whenever two {{champion:268}} of the same team use ultimates on them, if there's an enemy champion in thoses two ultimates, he gets knockup for the time of Azir's ultimate.

(Please excuse me for my bad english, i'm still learning)
